settings.title: The ultimate relaxation experience, at your home, office, or hotel

settings.editor:
Citherapy is a luxury mobile massage company in Los Angeles, bring massage and wellness treatments to your home, hotel room, or office. Our goal is to help people relax and improve their wellbeing through the best quality massage treatments.

Save yourself the time and energy of traveling to the spa or a clinic with our mobile massage service. You can relax in your own environment and receive the best spa experience wherever you are, when you most need it.

settings.title: Relax and let our professional therapists take care of you

settings.editor: We are dedicated to delivering the highest level of customer service and providing all our clients with the best mobile massage experience. Each of our therapists has years of experience in their field, so you can be sure that you are in good hands!

settings.description_text: Team of dozens of trained and qualified professional therapists to choose from.
All treatments include folding massage bed, aroma oils, luxury towels, and relaxing music.
Citherapy is committed to following the highest level of hygiene and safety guidelines.
We are available 7 days a week, ready to treat you within 1 hour across central LA.

settings.testimonial_content: “I had a great massage therapy with James. He has magical hands!  I have been looking for a good mobile massage company for some time, and I finally found one! I have not been so relaxed in a long time…”

“ The best Thai massage I’ve ever received! This was my first experience with a home massage and I will certainly be booking again! It really helped release my back and shoulder pain. Highly recommended.”
“I booked a Swedish couple massage therapy for my husband and I, and it was the most amazing experience. We both felt so relaxed and happy. Maria's hands are gold! We'll definitely book again soon.”
